transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, good morning sir.
Customer: Haan. Ji sir.
Executive: Haan, mai keh raha hu, haan mai sir ye keh raha hu WhatsApp pe sir dekho maine aapko WhatsApp pe screenshot share kiye hain. Theek hai?
Customer: Achha. Haan.
Executive: Haan, aap usme ek baar select karo ki kaun kaun si aur category mein add kar sakta hu sir. Wo maine aapke related category share kiya hai.
Customer: Aisa hai, aisa hai. Mai abhi mai apne workshop pe aaya hu. Matlab kaam pe baitha hu. Yaha par mai ek ek ek minute bhi free nahi rehta hu.
Executive: Haan haan, koi baat nahi.
Customer: To mai dekh leta hu aapko.
Executive: Jab bhi, jab bhi sir aap free ho jaye na, mujhe aap us time pe mujhe message dal dijiyega, mai add kar dunga sir, theek hai?
Customer: Haan, theek theek hai. Mai mai check kar dunga aapko WhatsApp pe.
Executive: Haan haan, mujhe message kar dijiyega sir bas. Haan, WhatsApp pe dal deta hu.
Executive: Haan, WhatsApp pe mujhe message dal dijiyega sir. Usme select kar lo kaun kaun si aur add kar sakta hu, wo mai kar dunga sir, theek hai?
Customer: Theek, theek. Ek ek product ek ek product
Executive: Kar deta hu sir mai aapka. Uske complete karta jaunga.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, mai abhi sab kuch dekh kar aapko WhatsApp kar deta hu.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji, bilkul.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add more categories.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to send details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, categories, product
